name: repliqate
description: Repliqate is a self-hosted tool for copying content across multiple storage systems with configurable rules. Itâ€™s designed for automating replication tasks in multiple environments.
features: Multi-storage replication: Copy data across local disks, network shares, and cloud storage providers.
Rule-based automation: Define custom rules for what content to replicate and where.
Scheduled tasks: Run replication jobs on a schedule to keep backups current.
Incremental sync: Transfer only changed files to minimize bandwidth and time.
Conflict handling: Automatically resolve or flag conflicts when files differ between sources.
Verification checks: Validate data integrity after replication using checksums.
Parallel transfers: Speed up replication by copying multiple files simultaneously.
Filtering options: Include or exclude files based on patterns, size, or modification date.
Logging and reporting: Track all replication activities with detailed logs for auditing.
Retry logic: Automatically retry failed transfers to handle temporary network issues.
Bandwidth throttling: Limit transfer speeds to avoid saturating network connections.
Web dashboard: Monitor replication status and configure jobs through a browser interface.
